metadata.title: CVE-2018-11100 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The decompileSETTARGET function in decompile.c in libming through 0.4.8mishandles cases where the header indicates a file size greater than theactual size, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(Segmentation fault and application crash) or possibly have unspecifiedother impact.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
